plot: David Hasselhoff has traveled to Sweden to host a talk show on Swedish television. In each episode he invites famous Swedish people that fits into the theme of the night. He asks them his signature question: Why are you famous?
plot_en: David Hasselhoff has traveled to Sweden to host a talk show on Swedish television. In each episode he invites famous Swedish people that fits into the theme of the night. He asks them his signature question: Why are you famous?
plot_es: David Hasselhoff has traveled to Sweden to host a talk show on Swedish television. In each episode he invites famous Swedish people that fits into the theme of the night. He asks them his signature question: Why are you famous?
title: Hasselhoff - en svensk talkshow
